TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 280

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to---------[about November 1, 1829]. Address on repulse of Spanish invasion. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 280

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to---------[about November 1, 1829]. Address on repulse of Spanish invasion. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Failure of the *person_mentioned*Spanish */person_mentioned*Invasion*/p*
*p*[This document, probably intended by Austin for an editorial in The Texas Gazette, is omitted. It is undated, but was probably written about November 1, 1829.] See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
